Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Former Foreign Minister David Levy quit his erstwhile Likud party on Monday, kicked-off his own political framework, and indicated he will run for the premiership in next year's national elections.
